mapper.insert: INSERT INTO systemuser ( username, password, default_league_id ) VALUES ( #{user.username}, #{password}, #{user.defaultLeague.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE systemuser SET player_id = #{player.id}, default_league_id = #{defaultLeague.id} WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.select: SELECT username, player.id AS playerId, player.name AS playerName, player.full_name AS playerFullName, player.group_name AS playerGroupName, league.id AS leagueId, league.name AS leagueName, league.active AS leagueActive FROM systemuser LEFT JOIN player ON systemuser.player_id=player.id LEFT JOIN league ON systemuser.default_league_id=league.id WHERE username = #{username}
